snippet: Rutgers introduced its new head football coach, Kyle Flood, on Tuesday, and he has already had to face the challenge of keeping intact his team’s highly regarded recruiting class.
abstract: Rutgers introduces new football coach Kyle Flood, who faces the significant challenge of holding together the team's highly regarded recruiting class.
lead_paragraph: Rutgers introduced its new head football coach, Kyle Flood, on Tuesday, and he has already had to face the challenge of keeping intact his team’s highly regarded recruiting class.

headline.seo: New Rutgers Coach Hits the Ground Phoning, Cajoling Recruiting Class
headline.main: New Coach at Rutgers Hits Ground Phoning in Bid to Keep Recruits
headline.print_headline: New Coach at Rutgers Hits Ground Phoning In Bid to Keep Recruits
